description: A scalable high-throughput metabolic and biogeochemical functional trait profiler based on microbial genomes | A scalable high-throughput metabolic and biogeochemical functional trait profiler | This software enables the prediction of metabolic and biogeochemical functional trait profiles to any given genome datasets. These genome datasets can either be metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs), single-cell amplified genomes (SAGs) or pure culture sequenced genomes. It can also calculate the genome coverage. The information is parsed and diagrams for elemental/biogeochemical cycling pathways (currently Nitrogen, Carbon, Sulfur and "other") are produced
name: metabolic
